// here are some test cases 
//case R 1:
r1= 10 0000000000001010
r2=  3 0000000000000011            
//ADD r1 ,r2               ADD 001  010
r1= 13 0000000000001101  

//case R 2:
r1 = 2 0000000000000010
r2 = 5 0000000000000101
//SUB r1, r2 		   SUB 001 010
r1 = -3 1111111111111101
 
// case R 3:
r1 = -16 1111111111110000
r2 = 3 	 0000000000000011
//SRA r1 ,r2      SRA 001 , 010
 // r1= 1111111111111110      -2


//Case R 4:
r1 = 16  0000000000010000
r2 = 3 	 0000000000000011
//SRA r1 ,r2      SRA 001 , 010
 // r1=  0000000001000000      64

// Case R 5:
r1 = 65535 1111111111111111
r2 = 1     0000000000000001
SLTU r1 ,r2    	   SLTU 001 ,010    set less than not SHIFT idiot
//r1 =     

// Case R 6:
r1 = 65535 11111111111111111
r1 = 1 	   00000000000000001
SLT 001 010
r1 = 000000000000000 0 false  

// Case R 7:
r1 = 2     00000000000000010
r2 = 1     00000000000000001
SLL  001 010
r1 = 4     00000000000000100   

// Case I 1
r1 = 0000000000000101 5
ADDI  r1 , 1 
r1 = 0000000000000110  6

// Case I 2:
r1 = 0000000000000101 5
ADDI  r1 , -1
r1 = 0000000000000100 4


// Case I 3:
r1 = 1111111111000000     -64
SRAI 001 0000000000000011 shift by 3
r1 = 1111111111111000

// Case I 4:
r1 = 1111111111000000     -64
SRLI 001 0000000000000011 shift by 3
r1 = 1111111111000000


//
// Case I 5:
 LI r1 1111111111111111       LI  001 1111111111111111
r1 = 1111111111111111 

// Case I 6 :
r1=1111111111111100 -4
SLTI  r1  1111111111111110/-2
r1=1
